Package arb.curves

Class Lemniscate

java.lang.Object
arb.curves.Lemniscate
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlaneCurve, Function<Real,Complex>, RealToComplexFunction, AutoCloseable
public class Lemniscate extends Object implements PlaneCurve, AutoCloseable
A parameterization of a scaled Bernoullian lemniscate whose
curvature is given by
κ(t) = ((3*√2)*cos(t))/(scale*√(3-cos(2t)))
and its tangential angle by
φ(t) = 3*tan^⁻¹(sin(t))

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface arb.functions.RealToComplexFunction

    RealToComplexFunction.Complexification

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Lemniscate()
    The default scale is 2, which is the case where the integral over the absolute value of thisRealToComplexFunction.differential() is equal to the Lemniscate constant, which is the ratio of the perimeter of a lemniscate to its diameter

    • getArcLength

      public RealFunction getArcLength()
      Description copied from interface: PlaneCurve
      The arc-length function measures how far this particle travels as a function of time. The formula for the arc-length function follows directly from the formula for arc length: s=∫(|this'(t)|,t=0..s)
      Specified by:
      getArcLength in interface PlaneCurve
      Returns:
